title: Satellite images reveal conditions that contributed to 'catastrophic' wildfire season
description: WINNIPEG — Images from space and artificial intelligence can help detect areas prone to extreme wildfires, researchers suggest, after satellite photos showed dry parts of Manitoba ahead of its devastating wildfire season.
content:

title: Meta and Mark Zuckerberg tap MAGA influencer as AI ‘bias’ adviser
description: Meta has brought on right-wing influencer Robby Starbuck to join an internal board purportedly focused on rooting out bias from its artificial intelligence models.
content:
Happy Tuesday! Here’s your Tech Drop, a roundup of the past week’s top stories from the intersection of technology and politics.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Healthcare Highlights: Assura Bid, Wegovy Lawsuits, and AI in Hospitals
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Labor unions mobilize to challenge advance of algorithms in workplaces
description: As employers and tech companies rush to deploy artificial intelligence software into workplaces to improve efficiency, labor unions are stepping up work with state lawmakers across the nation to restrict its use.
content: In Massachusetts, the Teamsters labor union is backing a proposed state law that would require autonomous vehicles to have a human safety operator who can intervene during the ride, effectively forbidding truly driverless rides. Oregon lawmakers rece... [5711 chars]
